Package com.oop.Spider.services

Class CrawlTwitter

java.lang.Object
com.oop.Spider.Interface.CrawlerInterface
com.oop.Spider.services.CrawlTwitter
@Service
public class CrawlTwitter
extends CrawlerInterface
Creates a twitter "client" to crawl data from Twitter
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sim Poh Kang Sebastian

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      public void authenticate​(java.lang.String consumerkey, java.lang.String consumerSecret, java.lang.String accessToken, java.lang.String accessTokenSecret)

      Configures OAuth keys for verification for communication with Twitter API. Keys required are the consumer key, consumer secret, access token, access token secret. They can be obtained via a unique Twitter App developer account.

      Parameters:
      consumerkey - - Twitter's consumer key
      consumerSecret - - Twitter's consumerSecret
      accessToken - - Twitter's accessToken
      accessTokenSecret - - Twitter's accessTokenSecret

    • Crawl

      public void Crawl​(java.lang.String searchTerm) throws java.io.IOException, CustomError, twitter4j.TwitterException

      A function that takes in String as a query to search tweet posts based on the said query.

      Specified by:
      Crawl in class CrawlerInterface
      Parameters:
      searchTerm - - The value to be searched
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - If there's error during input or output
      twitter4j.TwitterException - - An exception class that will be thrown when TwitterAPI calls are failed.
      CustomError
      Since:
      1.0

    • ConvertToJson

      public void ConvertToJson​(java.lang.String searchTerm) throws java.io.IOException, CustomError

      A function that takes in String as a query to search tweet posts based on the said query. Returns prints list of tweets found based on the query and also converts the text of posts to JSON format.

      Parameters:
      searchTerm - - The value to be searched
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - If there's error during input or output
      CustomError
